tool:
-Generate Viper Report for a gene of interest.
macros.xml
@VERSION_CMD@
viper_report.r --output $viz --sample $sample --gene $gene --activity $activity
This command generates a visualization of the activity of a list of regulator gene for a given sample. Output is a PNG image for each gene in the list.
Usage: viper_report.r [options]
Options: -o OUTPUT, --output=OUTPUT Path to output file, saved as PNG.
-a ACTIVITY, --activity=ACTIVITY Path to VIPER activity output file.
-s SAMPLE, --sample=SAMPLE Name of sample of interest.
-n GENE, --gene=GENE Name of gene of interest.
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
